snippet.title: The Fabulous Fear Machine - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description: Enjoy the release date trailer for the upcoming horror strategy game The Fabulous Fear Machine, narrated by the game's protagonist, Jen Hammond. The Fabulous Fear Machine will launch on PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG) on October 4, and a playable demo is available now on Steam as part of Strategy Fest.
